Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~sykesm Since most of the release notes will be related to the serviceability epics, can you take a first pass of the release notes in /fabric/release_notes/v1.4.0.txt. Note, we're not going to do a separate v1.4.0-rc1.txt release note anymore.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/27944 FAB-13129 1.4 release notes for operations
